Items.Title: Oversight - 2003: Facilitating Governmental Operations and Fulfilling Democracy's Mandate
Items.MatterName: Oversight - 2003: Facilitating Governmental Operations and Fulfilling Democracy's Mandate

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the City Council to strongly oppose President Bush's re-nomination of Charles Pickering to the appellate court and commend the Congressional Black Caucus, Senator Charles Schumer and Senator Hillary Rodham Clinton for their opposition to such re-nomination.
Items.MatterName: Council to strongly oppose President Bush's re-nomination of Charles Pickering to the appellate court.
